description: Try our easy to follow Aromatic Chicken Pilaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pilaf,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Aromatic Chicken Pilaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a nonstick frying pan, add the onion, garlic and red pepper and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until softened.
Add the spices and continue to fry for 1 minute, then add the chicken and cook for 2 minutes until browned all over. Add the rice to the pan and stir to combine.
Stir in the chicken stock and apricots, cover tightly and simmer for 15 minutes until the rice is cooked through and the chicken is tender. Leave to stand, covered, for 5 minutes.
Scatter over the coriander and top each serving with a spoonful of yoghurt. Serve immediately.
